## 区间估计

```{r}
mean(lj$price_sqm)
var(lj$price_sqm)
sd(lj$price_sqm)

# 1. 抽样，根据抽样来做区间估计
set.seed(123)
lj_s <- sample_n(lj,100)

(sample_mean <- mean(lj_s$price_sqm))

# 1.1 假定方差已知
(E <- qnorm(0.975)*sd(lj$price_sqm)/sqrt(100))

(ci_1 <- sample_mean + c(-E, E))

# 1.2 假定方差未知
(E2 <- qt(0.975,99) *sd(lj_s$price_sqm)/sqrt(100))
(ci_2 <- sample_mean + c(-E2, E2))

t.test(lj_s$price_sqm)
```
